margs:
["SELECT 
	
	json_array(`mutall_chama`.`member`.`member` , concat(`mutall_chama`.`member`.`email` )) as `member`,
	`mutall_chama`.`member`.`name`  as `name`,
	`mutall_chama`.`member`.`email`  as `email`,
	`mutall_chama`.`member`.`photo`  as `photo`,
	`mutall_chama`.`member`.`registration_id`  as `registration_id`,
	`mutall_chama`.`member`.`occupation`  as `occupation`,
	`mutall_chama`.`member`.`tel_no`  as `tel_no`,
	json_array(`mutall_chama`.`member`.`group` , `group_selector`.`friend__` ) as `group`,
	json_array(`mutall_chama`.`member`.`user` , `user_selector`.`friend__` ) as `user`,
	`mutall_chama`.`member`.`locked`  as `locked` 
FROM 
	`mutall_chama`.`member`
inner join 	 (SELECT 
	
	`mutall_chama`.`group`.`group`  as `group_selector`,
	concat(`mutall_chama`.`group`.`name` , '/', `mutall_chama`.`group`.`id` ) as `friend__` 
FROM 
	`mutall_chama`.`group`


) as `group_selector`  ON  `mutall_chama`.`member`.`group`  = `group_selector`.`group_selector`
left join 	 (SELECT 
	
	`mutall_users`.`user`.`user`  as `user_selector`,
	concat(`mutall_users`.`user`.`email` ) as `friend__` 
FROM 
	`mutall_users`.`user`


) as `user_selector`  ON  `mutall_chama`.`member`.`user`  = `user_selector`.`user_selector`

 LIMIT 40 OFFSET 0"]
